#summary Called to pass user specific info, e.g., user name or avatar

{{{
got_user_info(user_id:int, keys:Array/*String*/, values:Array/*Object*/)  
}}}

`got_user_info` is used to pass user info to the game; it will be called for each user (players and viewers) of the game.

The keys that are currently supported:
|| *Key* || *Description* ||
|| `avatar_full_url` || Full url of the avatar of the user ||
|| `nick_name` || The nick name of the user ||
